SELECT Assessment.ID AS ID, Assessment.STID AS STID, SchoolTerm.Name AS SchoolTermName, Assessment.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID, Assessment.TrueName AS TrueName, Assessment.DisciplineRank AS DisciplineRank, Assessment.IntegrateRank AS IntegrateRank, Assessment.Judgment AS Judgment, Assessment.RecordDate AS RecordDate FROM Assessment INNER JOIN SchoolTerm ON SchoolTerm.ID = Assessment.STID
Assessment.STID = #STID#
Assessment.EmployeeID = #EmployeeID#
